name: NO WAY OUT!
description:
BA Project presented by Ousama Andari

THIS GAME WAS MADE USING MANIPULATIVE DESIGN STRATEGIES + SOME BASIC CODING!

GAME DESCRIPTION:

The castle of pain, an adventurous experience that can be dangerous and painful, Many creatures entered it, but none came out! Owlet a creature from the sky has decided to enter it and discover what it's all about. Thus, the castle remains a mystery that no one has been able to solve!

CREDITS:

OUSAMA ANDARI

CODE

LEVEL DESIGN

NARRATIVE DESIGN

This game was created at the Game Design // UE at the University of Europe for the Applied Sciences.

Supervised by: Prof.Florian Berger & Christopher Etmer
